attributes.action: save the unique & historic structures of the former National Gas Turbine Establishment at Pyestock from commercial development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The former site of the National Gas Turbine Establishment at Pyestock in Farnborough, Hampshire faces being levelled to make way for a number of distribution warehouses occupying an area equivalent to the size of the Millenium Dome.  This cannot be allowed to happen.  The site, now decommissioned, houses the history of British aero engine testing in the structures that remain there today.  We call on the PM to save these remaining structures and protect them from any future development, thereby preserving a crucial part of our country's aviation heritage.
